attributes.action: change the national anthem to the theme tune from the Archers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Singing about god saving our monarchy flies in the face of most people for a number of obvious reasons. The tune is a dirge and reflects nothing of our country. An upbeat tune like the Archers theme would be a relief. The Spanish anthem has no words, and ours would be better without - we can all dum-di-dum along anyway

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
